channel.title: Global Accelerator Report - the big shifts in numbers
channel.description:
http://gust.com/global-accelerator-report-2015/
We can see corporate and non-profit models are emerging, and see which programmes have the most impact in aggregate. For Source Institute, where do you think this is heading? What should we focus to help accelerators create the most impact?
Would love your analysis on this.

item.title: Global Accelerator Report - the big shifts in numbers
item.dc:creator: @salim Salim Virani
item.description:
@salim wrote:

Gust.com

Global Accelerator Report 2015 by Gust

Accelerators are increasingly being seen as new seed or pre-seed forms of venture capital that emerged due to growing entrepreneurial culture - which the public sector is keen to support.

We can see corporate and non-profit models are emerging, and see which programmes have the most impact in aggregate. For Source Institute, where do you think this is heading? What should we focus to help accelerators create the most impact?

Would love your analysis on this.

Read full topic
item.source: Global Accelerator Report - the big shifts in numbers
